dragon.boss.start: The Ancient Fire Dragon roars as it emerges from the mountain peak, its eyes glowing with ancient fury.
dragon.boss.defeat: With a final, thunderous roar, the Ancient Fire Dragon collapses, its fiery breath extinguished. The land begins to heal from its scorched wrath.
orc_chieftain.boss.start: The Orc Chieftain grips his massive war axe and lets out a blood-curdling war cry. 'None shall pass my domain!'
orc_chieftain.boss.defeat: The Orc Chieftain falls to one knee, his war banner striking the ground. 'The forest... remembers... warriors...' he mutters before collapsing.
goblin_king.boss.start: The Goblin King sits upon a throne of stolen treasures, his eyes gleaming with cunning. 'Another adventurer to add to my collection!'
goblin_king.boss.defeat: The Goblin King's crown clatters to the ground as he falls. His goblin minions scatter in terror, their leader's reign ended.
troll_king.boss.start: The Troll King roars, shaking the very foundations of the ruins. 'WHO DISTURBS MY SLUMBER?'
troll_king.boss.defeat: The massive Troll King crashes to the ground, his regenerative powers failing. The ancient ruins seem to sigh with relief.
swamp_hydra.boss.start: The Swamp Hydra rises from the poisonous waters, its multiple heads hissing menacingly. 'FOOLISH MORTALS... DINNER TIME...'
swamp_hydra.boss.defeat: The final head of the Swamp Hydra slithers into the murky depths, the creature's reign of terror finally ended.
ice_queen.boss.start: The Ice Queen appears, her form ethereal and cold. 'You dare enter my domain? Prepare to join the eternal winter!'
ice_queen.boss.defeat: The Ice Queen's form shatters like fragile ice, her eternal winter retreating as her power fades away.
shadow_lord.boss.start: The Shadow Lord materializes from the darkness, his voice echoing from all directions. 'You cannot defeat what you cannot see!'
shadow_lord.boss.defeat: The Shadow Lord dissolves into wisps of dark energy, the light returning to the fortress as his influence wanes.
fire_elemental_lord.boss.start: The Fire Elemental Lord blazes into existence, the temperature soaring. 'YOUR FLESH SHALL FEED MY ETERNAL FLAME!'
fire_elemental_lord.boss.defeat: The Fire Elemental Lord collapses into a pile of cooling embers, the temple's heat slowly dissipating.
ice_giant_king.boss.start: The Ice Giant King rises to his full height, frost covering his massive form. 'LITTLE SPARK... YOU ARE NOTHING!'
ice_giant_king.boss.defeat: The Ice Giant King shatters into a thousand frozen fragments, the citadel's eternal winter beginning to thaw.
thunder_lord.boss.start: Thunder Lord Thorigar slams his lightning hammer to the ground, bolts of lightning crackling around him. 'THE SKIES OBEY ME!'
thunder_lord.boss.defeat: The Thunder Lord collapses, his hammer sparking one final time before falling silent. The storms on the peak begin to calm.
necromancer_lord.boss.start: Necromancer Lord Vorthak raises his staff, undead minions rising around him. 'WELCOME, TRAVELERS... TO YOUR ETERNAL REST!'
necromancer_lord.boss.defeat: The Necromancer Lord falls, his magical barrier shattering. The undead minions collapse as their master's power is broken.
demon_prince.boss.start: Demon Prince Azgorath emerges from the chaotic portal, flames dancing around him. 'MORTAL FOOLS! YOU HAVE SUMMONED YOUR OWN DOOM!'
demon_prince.boss.defeat: The Demon Prince's form wavers as the portal destabilizes. With a final scream of rage, he is pulled back into the void.
void_tyrant.boss.start: Void Tyrant Kael'dor manifests from nothingness, reality warping around him. 'YOUR EXISTENCE ENDS... HERE.'
void_tyrant.boss.defeat: The Void Tyrant's form unravels as reality reasserts itself. The terrible void recedes, leaving only silence.
celestial_guardian.boss.start: The Celestial Guardian descends, radiant light illuminating the tower. 'PROVE YOUR WORTHINESS, SEEKER. DEFEAT ME TO ASCEND!'
celestial_guardian.boss.defeat: The Celestial Guardian bows his head in respect. 'You have proven yourself worthy. The path to ascension is open.'
supreme_being.boss.start: The Supreme Being regards you with ancient eyes. 'YOU HAVE COME FAR, HERO. BUT YOUR LEGACY ENDS HERE!'
supreme_being.boss.defeat: The Supreme Being acknowledges your victory. 'IMPRESSIVE... YOUR LEGACY TRULY BEGINS NOW.'
